status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: syhily and Jianyun Zhao could you take a look whether this is a Pulsar connector specific problem?

trohrmann I have read all the test report, some tests are failed because of 

org.apache.pulsar.client.api.PulsarClientException$BrokerMetadataException: Consumer not found

I can fixed this issue. Other may need more time to investigate.
Thanks syhily, I've assigned you to the ticket.

I met a similar issue.

https://dev.azure.com/apache-flink/apache-flink/_build/results?buildId=22612&view=logs&j=fc5181b0-e452-5c8f-68de-1097947f6483&t=995c650b-6573-581c-9ce6-7ad4cc038461&l=25015
xtsong The test failure should be fixed in this PR. Tks for your comments.

https://dev.azure.com/apache-flink/apache-flink/_build/results?buildId=26086&view=logs&j=245e1f2e-ba5b-5570-d689-25ae21e5302f&t=d04c9862-880c-52f5-574b-a7a79fef8e0f&l=25247

 

syhily  hello~ The issue seems reproduced on 1.14, could you have a double look~?

gaoyunhaii I think this is a new issue caused by Exclusive consumer is already connected. Can you submit another issue?
trohrmann I think we can close this issue and track it in a new issue.
Aright, I've created FLINK-24872 for tracking the new issue.
